img.title: AmazonSmile is a website operated by Amazon that lets customers enjoy the same wide selection of products, low prices, and convenient shopping features as on Amazon.com. The difference is that when customers shop on AmazonSmile (smile.amazon.com), the AmazonSmile Foundation will donate 0.5% of the price of eligible purchases to the charitable organizations selected by customers. Look for "Lincoln Academy Incorporated" start shopping today!

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-has-children first menu-item-71

div.h1: Lincoln Academy was awarded “2019 Charter School of the Year”by the Utah Charter Network!

h4.a: New Students Apply here for the 2020-2021 school year!

div.p: The lottery for the 2020-2021 School year is now closed. There are limited positions available in certain grades. To apply for the waitlist please click here!

p.span: If you have any questions, please contact us at enrollment@lincoln-academy.org

span.style: font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #333333; background: white;
font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #333333; background: white;

p.span: opened in August 2005. Lincoln Academy is a free public school of choice. All students desiring admission into the school may apply. In accordance with State and Federal requirements, Lincoln Academy does not discriminate based on race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin, or ability/disability status. Small class sizes are a high priority at Lincoln Academy. Our adult to student ratio is approximately 15 students to every adult, which includes the teacher and teaching assistant. Our ideal target for class sizes is between 25 and 30 students per class. Our classes are comprised of 3 classes per grade from kindergarten through 5th grade, 4 classes in 6th grade and an estimated 330 students for junior high grades 7 through 9.

span.style: font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #333333; background: white;

p.span: Following the open enrollment period, in each grade with fewer applicants than positions available, all students will be admitted. If the number of applicants exceeds the number of positions available, students will be chosen by a random lottery. Following the lottery, you will receive an email or phone call notifying you of your child’s enrollment status. Once a student is selected through the lottery process, the siblings of that family are also enrolled in their respective classes – if openings are still available. Otherwise, siblings remain on the sibling preference list and will be notified when positions become available. If the status of your child changes, you will be contacted. As students enroll, the wait list will automatically be updated. All those entering Kindergarten must be 5 years old on or before the September 1st deadline. Junior High students may be offered Release Time on an “as needed” basis.

span.style: font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #333333; background: white;

p.span: Once notified that your children have been selected, you will then be given one week to complete the enrollment process by registering your children. You will be required to provide copies of your children’s birth certificates and immunization records. If you do not have these readily available, please gather them now so you will be able to access them quickly if your children are selected. If you fail to register your children during the time allotted, you may forfeit their enrollment status at the school, and other students will be given the opportunity to enroll at the school. If your children are not chosen during our initial enrollment period, your enrollment application will be saved for that school year only. As positions become available families will be contacted. You are welcome to call the school at anytime if you have questions regarding wait lists.

span.style: font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #333333; background: white;

p.span: The lottery will run February 12th at 10:00 am.

span.style: font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #333333; background: white;

p.span: Thank you for your interest in Lincoln Academy!
